comment._content: All you Ryerson students out there had better recognise this building...

comment._content: Nice! I haven't seen a photo of this original building before.

comment.author: 10719794@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/81674810@N06]   Yes indeed the facade of the Normal School remains on the grounds of Ryerson University.  However, I believe the map location is actually on Gould St just West of Church St.
